name: BC-2 Bass Combo
details:
Classic “AC-inspired” British combo-amp toneWide range of tones with a single knob —from classic crisp clean and punchy crunch to creamy overdrive with long sustain and beyond
Natural and dynamic response to picking nuance at any knob position
Provides warm combo tones and authentic combo-amp cabinet resonance
